title: Trans and Intersex Coffee
description: A new monthly coffee group open to anyone who identifies as transgender, intersex, non-binary or questioning. Come and meet up for a friendly chat and a coffee, and if you’re up for it a look round the Zoology museum afterwards. A puffin teddy will be on the table to identify the group. This cafe has step free access and accessible toilets. If you’re nervous about coming, or would like to meetup beforehand don’t hesitate to get in contact
